meanings.definition: A structure in which eggs are produced and stored in animals.
meanings.sent1: The ovisac of the bird held many eggs.
meanings.sent2: The farmer observed the ovisac of the sheep.
meanings.sent3: The ovisac of the hen was like a treasure chest of eggs.
meanings.sent4: Her abdomen was a delicate ovisac, cradling new life.
meanings.sent5: The ovisac pulsated with the promise of future chicks.

meanings.definition: A structure in which eggs are produced and stored in insects.
meanings.sent1: The ant's ovisac was full of tiny eggs.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the ovisac of the beetle.
meanings.sent3: The ovisac of the butterfly was like a secret egg vault.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was an ovisac of ideas waiting to hatch.
meanings.sent5: The ovisac of the insect shimmered in the sunlight.
